channel.title: -How to i make all npc's in one area attack you-
channel.description: Hi moparscape, i'm just wondering on how t make all npc's in one area attack you. Is it possible, i made a daggonath area, and it's kinda lame, i wan't them to automatically attack a person that enters the coordinates or goes near them, such as KQ in ReapageScape v1, if you have any help, codes, suggestion, or links it's much appreciated.

item.title: -How to i make all npc's in one area attack you-
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Hi moparscape, i’m just wondering on how t make all npc’s in one area attack you. Is it possible, i made a daggonath area, and it’s kinda lame, i wan’t them to automatically attack a person that enters the coordinates or goes near them, such as KQ in ReapageScape v1, if you have any help, codes, suggestion, or links it’s much appreciated.
